interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Exfoliating Grapefruit Body Scrub for Face and Body Exfoliating Scrub for Acne and Inflammation, 12 Ounce by Pure Body Naturals Review Date: 2016/05/23 Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Brightening', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Exfoliating', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 3 x 2.6 inches; 13.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Grapefruit Facial Scrub', 'UPC': '646437736305'} Review Text: Scrubs are a nice way to get rid of dead skin, so this seemed like a good way to go. It isn't full of a bunch of chemicals and is similar to a salt scrub. It's not all wet, so don't go wiping it on your face without first getting it wet. The best way to use it, in my opinion, it to take a little pinch/scoop of it and add it to your body scrubber. I think an electric face scrubbing brush is fine it you have shower doors or a shower curtain to keep any pieces from flying all over, but this helps get the scrub really worked into the skin. You can also use it on a body sponge/wash cloth or even with your fingers.

It doesn't have a terribly strong smell, it's actually quite mild, which is fine because you don't always need to smell strongly with purfumes and fragrances. Over all it's a good scrub and works well for what it is used for.

*I RECEIVED THIS PRODUCT (IN ORDER TO TRY IT AND REVIEW) THIS DOES NOT GUARANTEE A GOOD REVIEW OR CHANGE MY OPINION ON THE PRODUCT, I AM HONEST AND UNBIASED, ALL OPINIONS ON IT ARE MY OWN AND BASED ON THE PRODUCT ITSELF. I HAVE TRIED THIS AND EVALUATED IT ACCORDINGLY Review Title: Keeps the skin soft and smooth Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

Detangling Brush Pink Hair Brush For Women Best Detangler for Adults and Kids - HAIR GLIDER Hair Glider ['The HAIR GLIDER is the ultimate detangler brush. This specially designed hairbrush glides through the toughest snarls. This features 2 levels of bristles designed to tease out knots with each stroke. Whether detangling adult hair or kids rushing to school this is sure to cut down on time and snags. When this arrives on your doorstep, simply tear open the Amazon box and see for yourself what all the rave reviews are about. With our 100% no hassle return policy consider ordering extra for family members, travel or as a gift.'] {'Brand': 'Hair Glider', 'Hair Type': 'Oily, Dry, Normal', 'Color': 'Peach', 'Model Name': 'Part.no', 'Item Weight': '0.2 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'Yes', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 2 x 1 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SPX8FL009-AF11', 'UPC': '755464306846', 'Manufacturer': 'Saprex'} I have very thick hair, for a long time I had a mat of tangles at the base of my skull that used to take me up to an hour to detangle. My hair was getting unmanageable so I cut it off. After donating 4 pony tails to locks of love, as my hair reached all the way down to my knees when I was standing up, I thought my hair would be easy to care for. But if I'm not careful, I still get very bad tangles in my short hair. Now that I am starting to grow it out again, I thought my troubles would be back, but I received an opportunity to try this brush at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest, unbiased, review. (all opinions are my own) I took my hair down from it's ponytail and ran the brush through, figuring it would get caught fairly quickly. To my surprise, it didn't really snag at all. It actually did as it claimed. My hair was smooth and the spot at the base of my skull that always gets missed no matter how hard I try, was also smooth and untangled. I am really shocked. I have tried so many brushes for myself and had sort of given up on finding something just for me. I will be keeping my brush in a safe place so my kids don't lose it and recommending to all of my friends. I am very happy with this purchase and would buy it again. It is worth the money. It actually detangled my extremely thick hair UNGLINGA Black Mask Blackhead Remover Purifying Peel Off Mask Bamboo Activated Charcoal Face Deep Pore Cleansing Mask For Face Nose and Acne Blemishes Treatment UNGLINGA ['CONCERNS: Enlarged pore, Blackheads, Anti-aging, Fine lines and blemishes, Oily skin, Strawberry nose. Effect: Absorbent pores of blackheads and stubborn dirt, shrink pores, regulate oil secretion. How to use： Step 1 : Wash your face with warm water and cover it with a hot towel to open the pores . Step 2 : Spread the Blackhead remover mask gently on your face and wait 10-15 for it to dry. Step 3 : Peel off the black mask gently from chin to forehead . Step 4 : Rains with cold water and you may apply your daily skin care products afterwards. Tips: 1.The Blackhead Mask is only used for removing blackheads, exfoliating and cleaning the skin. 2.No effective against acne. Don’t use it on your acne or inflamed areas. 3.Spread the Blackhead Mask slowly in the same direction on your face and don’t stay on the same area too long. 4. Please ensure that you are not allergic. 5. If there is any discomfort, stop using. Package Included: 1 * Blackhead remover mask Gender: Unisex Net weight: 60g Shelf life: 3 years Ingredients: WATER, PROPANEDIOL, KAOLIN, POLYVINYLALCOHOL CROSSPOLYMER, POLYVINYL ALCOHOL, RUBBER LATEX, AMMONIUM GLYCOLATE, IMIDAZOLIDINYL UREA, AROMA'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.9 x 3 x 2.9 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '712038120383 777269135650 646437061445 646437182287', 'Manufacturer': 'KoEily'} No one tells you when you are young that your face will break out even as an adult. Especially when things are stressful or it's just that time of the month. I had some friends tell me that mud masks are especially helpful for this, but that they are also good for exfoliating and keeping skin healthy. I tried using some bentonite clay as it says you can use it as a mud mask, but it ended up clumpy and hard to spread on my face. I always ended up making too much too, which only wasted it. It was too much trouble and I stopped using it. I decided to give the dead sea mud mask a go. It is much darker than I expected, my entire face was blue/grey. It's very easy to spread on, I just used one finger and small swisp on each section of my face. It doesn't take too much, I figured it would take a big scoop, but really it took much less. I have used it three times already, each before bed, and you can't even see a dent in how much was in the jar. I left it on about 10 minutes each time and then wiped it off with a wet wash cloth. My skin feels softer, is not breaking out, and my husband even noticed a difference.

*I RECEIVED THIS PRODUCT TO TRY IN EXCHANGE FOR AN HONEST AND UNBIASED REVIEW. THIS DOES NOT GUARANTEE A GOOD REVIEW, SO IF I GIVE THE PRODUCT ONE, IT MEANS I TRULY BELIEVE IT DESERVES IT. EVERYTHING IN THIS REVIEW IS 100% MY OWN AND HAS NOT BEEN INFLUENCED OR ALTERED IN ANY WAY Forget mixing up a powder, this is so much better than that Tweezers Set with Case | Slant, Straight and Pointed Tip Stainless Steel Tweezer OMAROA ["Trying to pull out a troublesome splinter?Tired of gluing your fingers together when applying fake eyelashes? Losing a screw from the hinge on your glasses? Scared of the massive ball of hair stuck in your shower drain? Sick of trying to thread needles with nearly-invisible thread? You need tweezers! Make difficult tasks easy with the right tools. Our Love It tweezers are perfect for grabbing, twisting, shaping and holding on to anything that's too delicate, small, fragile, or hard to grasp with your hands. These tweezers are built to last. Too often, tweezers are made with cheap material and careless manufacturing standards. This means that they quickly bend out of alignment and become useless. We don't want that to happen to you... which is why we build our tweezers out of stainless steel, machined carefully to come together in exactly the right position. A variety of tips for a variety of jobs. When you're handling anything small or fragile, the shape of your tweezers becomes extra important. That's why our Love It tweezer set ships with three different sizes of tool: standard, slanted, and extra-small. They're sharp, too-perfect for dislodging splinters or pulling that one annoying hair. And because they're sharp, we ship our Love It tweezers with a stylish leather carrying case, perfect for keeping them safe and protecting the other objects in your purse. No more squinting and fumbling when you try to do delicate jobs - order your set of Love It tweezers today!"] {'Brand': 'OMAROA', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3 x 0.1 x 0.3 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 0.1 x 0.3 inches; 0.1 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3179654', 'UPC': '646437258098', 'Manufacturer': 'OMAROA'} There are so many uses for tweezers, and I am used to having some from brands like Revlon and such that are okay, but they are not very high quality. The ends are usually dull and they have a hard time grabbing anything. I was extremely happy when I opened this pack of 3. They are a sturdy stainless steel metal, no plastic or cheap aluminum. The ends of the silver one are extremely pointy, perfect for pulling out things like splinters and anything that might get stuck in the skin. My husband was working and ended up with a large splinter under his finger nail. Since you can't exactly get it from the top, we decided to use the silver sharp pair of tweezers and were able to extract the splinter from under his nail. They also work very well for removing hair. I pluck from time to time and the black and pink pair are really nice for that. The silver is easy to get out any ingrown hairs. Overall the set is very high quality and very professional.

*I RECEIVED THIS ITEM TO TRY IN EXCHANGE FOR AN HONEST AND UNBIASED REVIEW. THIS DOES NOT GUARANTEE A GOOD REVIEW, SO IF I GIVE THE PRODUCT ONE, IT MEANS I TRULY BELIEVE IT DESERVES IT. EVERYTHING IN THIS REVIEW IS 100% MY OWN AND HAS NOT BEEN INFLUENCED OR ALTERED IN ANY WAY Very high quality and professional set Beard Oil and Conditioner - Fragrance Free - Huge 4 oz Bottle - 100% Natural - Softens Your Beard and Stops Itching - With Five Nourishing All Natural Oils Including Argan Oil and Jojoba Oil! BEARDSMEN SPIRIT {'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Liquid Volume': '4 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'BEARDSMEN SPIRIT', 'Number of Items': '2'} My husband has a very thick beard, and maintaining it is a lot easier with some beard oil. This bottle took me by surprise, it has a dropper top similar to those in essential oil bottles (which makes sense with the dark blue bottle and it being made with oils like jojoba)
The oil goes on easy, he can just shake a few drops out and rub it in.

He uses a boar bristle brush to help him get the oil down to the skin, it helps his beard stay softer and it has grown a lot longer than he usually lets it get. By now he usually gets fed up of it being itchy and shaves, but the oil stops the itchy issue.

The bottle is 4 ounces, so it will last quite some time. It doesn't take much to soften the hair.

*I RECEIVED THIS PRODUCT (IN ORDER TO TRY IT AND REVIEW) THIS DOES NOT GUARANTEE A GOOD REVIEW, I AM HONEST AND UNBIASED, ALL OPINIONS ON IT ARE MY OWN AND BASED ON THE PRODUCT ITSELF. Really big bottle! My husband loves it Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo, 8 Fl Oz - Smooths and Repairs - Sulfate Free - Natural - Imported from Morocco by Pure Body Naturals Pure Body Naturals {'Brand': 'Pure Body Naturals', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437736398 646437319751'} I try and use all natural products, in my hair and body care. I was hoping this would be, but there is a sodium laurel sulfate at the end. It's not as bad as most, it's mostly natural, but that is one I prefer not to use in my hair care. I passed the bottle on to my friend who normally uses pantene, so it was a lot healthier for her to use less chemicals over all.

Her hair looks great and the shampoo smells fine. It has a soapy smell, which is fine. It goes on fine, she said she used one pump for medium length hair, and it washed up fine. Her hair looks nice, it's clean and looks soft and shiny.

*I RECEIVED THIS PRODUCT AT A DISCOUNTED PRICE (IN ORDER TO TRY IT AND REVIEW) THIS DOES NOT GUARANTEE A GOOD REVIEW, I AM HONEST AND UNBIASED, ALL OPINIONS ON IT ARE MY OWN AND BASED ON THE PRODUCT ITSELF. Mostly natural Modern Mirror 92231 Dual-Sided Led illuminated tabletop makeup mirror Red Modern Mirror {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.2 x 4 x 11.4 inches; 15.04 Ounces', 'UPC': '794168090774 692014021845'} I have never been the type of girl to stand in front of a mirror and do make up for long periods of time. I have used a hand mirror for years, I prefer to sit somewhere like a bed or couch and do my make up. Using a hand mirror is harder though because you then only have one hand to work with the make up. While I don't do a ton, opening things like mascara or doing eye liner is a lot harder when you only have one hand.

This mirror stands up on it's own, so you don't have to hold it. It has a pretty red exterior and it even lights up. The light is not a really bright one, but enough to light up your face if you are in a room that is not as bright as you would like. The rim lights up on both sides, the regular mirror side and on the zoomed in mirror side. There is a place to plug it in, but no plug, so you can choose that option if you have a plug. I used the 3 AAA batteries that it came with. It works well for me to be able to do my make up without having to stand in the bathroom and I don't have to hang onto a hand mirror.

The best way to use it, in my opinion, it to take a little pinch/scoop of it and add it to your body scrubber. I think an electric face scrubbing brush is fine it you have shower doors or a shower curtain to keep any pieces from flying all over, but this helps get the scrub really worked into the skin. You can also use it on a body sponge/wash cloth or even with your fingers.

It doesn't have a terribly strong smell, it's actually quite mild, which is fine because you don't always need to smell strongly with purfumes and fragrances. Over all it's a good scrub and works well for what it is used for.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Needs:** User has thick hair, facing tangling issues, prioritizing effective detangling solutions.
- **Focus on Functionality:** They seek products that deliver genuine results, particularly for dampening and maintaining overall hair health with a preference for natural ingredients.
- **Positive Product Experience:** User appreciates effective tools and honest reviews, sharing their experiences to assist others in finding suitable products.
- **Willingness to Recommend:** Enthusiastically, they recommend positive experiences to family and friends, aiding their search for effective grooming solutions.
- **Commitment to Quality:** User invests in high-quality grooming items, valuing effectiveness over cost, carefully selecting products tailored for their family's unique needs, including thick hair and beards.
- **Family-Oriented:** Their considerations extend to family grooming tools, emphasizing healthier options for children and their spouse.
- **Skincare Enthusiast:** They maintain dedicated skincare routines, focusing on natural formulations to address adult skin concerns, prioritizing ease of use and overall effectiveness.
- **Versatile Tool Utilization:** User values multifunctional grooming and makeup tools, showing a keen interest in practical, efficient products that enhance their grooming routine without sacrificing convenience.
- **Recent Interaction Insight:** Their latest review highlights an appreciation for natural exfoliating products that promote skin softness and smoothness, further cementing their preference for effective, quality skincare solutions.

This profile reflects a strong commitment to functional, quality grooming and skincare products that deliver on performance, while also sharing insights for the benefit of their social circles.
